title: E-commerce Mobile App
problemStatement: Small e-commerce businesses struggle with managing inventory, processing orders, and tracking customer engagement across multiple platforms. Current solutions are either too expensive or lack mobile-first capabilities, resulting in lost sales and poor customer experience.
